ai_decisions.style_reasoning: Bold, energetic styling with a high-contrast color palette and pulsating animation to maximize visibility and urgency for an Instagram CTA. 'Follow for more!' needs to pop.
ai_decisions.color_psychology: The bright pink (#FF007B) is highly energetic, trendy, and associated with fun/viral content on Instagram. The cyan stroke (#00FFFF) provides excellent contrast for readability and adds a neon, eye-catching effect. White text (#FFFFFF) on this background/stroke combination ensures WCAG AAA contrast (well over 7:1) and pops effectively against almost any background content.

ai_decisions.style_reasoning: Using 'Impact' font for strong, attention-grabbing presence. Vibrant magenta background and contrasting yellow stroke with white text create high visual energy, ideal for Instagram Reels. Pulse animation adds subtle dynamism, encouraging action without being distracting. Black shadow enhances readability.
ai_decisions.color_psychology: The magenta (#FF00CC) signifies fun, viral trends, and excitement, aligning with Instagram's aesthetic. The bright yellow (#FFFF00) stroke and white (#FFFFFF) text create a high-contrast, attention-grabbing combination that also meets WCAG AAA contrast ratios. The pulse animation taps into the desire for instant engagement.
